about: Being a 3rd year Computer Science student at the University of British Columbia, I spend my time working on multiple passion projects, attending hackathons, and learning about exciting techology. What motivates me is the creative and problem-solving nature of tech industry, and the feeling of translating an idea from paper to reality.

skills.title: Languages
skills.skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, C, C++, R

skills.title: Web
skills.skills:
HTML5, CSS3, Django, SQLite,
NodeJS, MongoDB, Express, Firebase

projects.title: LendAHand
projects.subtitle: VanHacks 2020, 1st Place
projects.description: A volunteering recruitment website build to connect eager volunteers with local non-profit organizations.

projects.title: Pomo
projects.subtitle: Personal Project
projects.description: A productivity chrome extension made to help stay focused, time work sessions, and keep track of tasks. Features include browser alert notifcations, Chrome badge display for a quick glance at time left, and the ability to create, save, and mark off todo list items.

projects.title: inTouch
projects.subtitle: TreeHacks 2021
projects.tech: Node.js, React, Express, Firebase, Google Calendar API
projects.description: A site that lets friends find common availlabilities, built during TreeHacks 2021. Users can log in using Gmail, import their Google calendar, find overlapping free timeslots among their friends, and send them google event invites.

projects.title: Tetris
projects.subtitle: Personal Project
projects.description: This is a classic tetris game built with Java using the JavaFx UI package. Users can move and rotate blocks using the spacebar and arrow keys.

projects.title: RestoBot
projects.subtitle: Hack The North 2021
projects.tech: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Messenger API, Yelp API, radar.io, wit.ai
projects.description: Facebook messenger bot for choosing restaurants with friends, built during Hack the North 2021. The app displays local restaurant data and allows friends to vote on their favorite restaurant.

projects.title: Business Recommender
projects.subtitle: NwPlus HackCamp 2020
projects.description: A simple app made to search for local businesses based on busyness-level and distance, built during NwPlus HackCamp 2020. The app also filters out all currently closed listings.

projects.title: FoodPal
projects.subtitle: CPSC 210 Project
projects.description: A meal, calorie and ingredient tracker built using Java and the Swing UI package. Testing was done used JUnit. Data is persisted using JSON.

contact.title: Github
contact.description: How I spend my spare time.
